alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 3:20PM EST until January 31 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow, mainly north of Newberry. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero, mainly for interior areas away from the lakeshores. * WHERE...Luce County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warmer conditions immediately near Lake Superior will limit wind chill values. However, wind chills as low as 20 below zero will be possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
